product_description: Vibrant range of wall tiles, covering a rich variety of colours with a glossy or matt finish.

product_categories.category_name: Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems

price_adjustment_structure: Priced based on m2 purchased, starting from $77/m2 inc. GST
lead_time: Usually available immediately on site at Smithfield
recyclable_percentage_description: Available through third party recycling facilities
recyclable_offcuts_description: They can be used as fill material for construction sites and as background material for road beds.
recycled_content_description: Product contains 45% recycled content, as per the Product Self-Declaration ESM-60.
recycling_process_description: They can be used as fill material for construction sites and as background material for road beds, thus reducing the need for quarried gravel.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, 100% of water is recycled to eliminate potable water use.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Transport has not been included in the LCA.
minimisation_design_strategy: To minimise offcuts or wastage, it is recommended to consider the layout, design and size of the tile
installation_risks_description: Silica is a naturally occurring mineral found in many types of rock and soil, and therefore is found in many construction materials including tiles.  Please contact us for more information.
factory_finished_description:
WALL APPLICATION ONLY.

Glossy finish, available in a multitude of colours.

Matt finish (Slip Rating: P3) available in mattone only.

material_locations.material: Powder, ceramic glazes, colours and inks

other_comments: Our mission is to drive change in our industry by making a conscious effort to shift the way in which we source and procure products.
type_of_packaging: The tiles are packed in cardboard boxes, wrapped with polyethylene film and plastic straps, and stacked on wooden pallets. Cardboards and Europallets are 100% recycled.

recycled_content_description: Product contains 45% recycled content, as per the Product Self-Declaration ESM-60.
recycling_process_description: They can be used as fill material for construction sites and as background material for road beds, thus reducing the need for quarried gravel.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, 100% of water is recycled to eliminate potable water use.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Transport has not been included in the LCA.
minimisation_design_strategy: To minimise offcuts or wastage, it is recommended to consider the layout, design and size of the tile
installation_risks_description: Silica is a naturally occurring mineral found in many types of rock and soil, and therefore is found in many construction materials including tiles.  Please contact us for more information.
factory_finished_description:
Glossy finish (wall only), available in aqua, green, night and white.

Matt finish (Slip Rating: P3) available.

material_locations.material: Powder, ceramic glazes, colours and inks

other_comments: Our mission is to drive change in our industry by making a conscious effort to shift the way in which we source and procure products.
type_of_packaging: The tiles are packed in cardboard boxes, wrapped with polyethylene film and plastic straps, and stacked on wooden pallets. Cardboards and Europallets are 100% recycled.
